about_the_game:
Information: Requires ownership of the OMSI 2 Add-on Strassenbahn NF6D Essen/Gelsenkirchen DLC.

The beautiful town „Zille“ is a tourist place in Sauerland. Especially many tourists from Lower Saxony and Ruhr district go there. They have the opportunity to spend a nice day or even a vacation in „Zille“.

There are two ridable lines in the undulating landscape with many small villages. The line 1 runs from the lower Terminus up to the mountain with a journey time about 15 minutes. At the location „Zille“ and „Zilleberg“ runs the bus line 301 with a journey time about 25 minutes. Serpentines are not a loanword there. Here the bus driver can put his ability to the test. The slogan in „Zille“ is: „Drive slowly always“.

Sit down behind the bus drivers seat and carry the eager passengers through the undulating town „Zille“.


  • Two driveable line, below one bus- and one tram line
  • Drive through the small villages of „Zille“ and experience numerous serpentines and varied places with a undulating landscape
  • Zahlreiche neue Objekte wurden für die Karte angefertigt und optimiert
  • New objects was made and adjusted for the map
  • The tram was optimized for all established payware- and freeware add-ons, below the NF6D
  • Extensive manual and also backing-up material
detailed_description:
Information: Requires ownership of the OMSI 2 Add-on Strassenbahn NF6D Essen/Gelsenkirchen DLC.

The beautiful town „Zille“ is a tourist place in Sauerland. Especially many tourists from Lower Saxony and Ruhr district go there. They have the opportunity to spend a nice day or even a vacation in „Zille“.

There are two ridable lines in the undulating landscape with many small villages. The line 1 runs from the lower Terminus up to the mountain with a journey time about 15 minutes. At the location „Zille“ and „Zilleberg“ runs the bus line 301 with a journey time about 25 minutes. Serpentines are not a loanword there. Here the bus driver can put his ability to the test. The slogan in „Zille“ is: „Drive slowly always“.

Sit down behind the bus drivers seat and carry the eager passengers through the undulating town „Zille“.


  • Two driveable line, below one bus- and one tram line
  • Drive through the small villages of „Zille“ and experience numerous serpentines and varied places with a undulating landscape
  • Zahlreiche neue Objekte wurden für die Karte angefertigt und optimiert
  • New objects was made and adjusted for the map
  • The tram was optimized for all established payware- and freeware add-ons, below the NF6D
  • Extensive manual and also backing-up material

name: OMSI 2 Add-on K-Bergbahn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2,8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: at least 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: OMSI 2 – The Omnibussimulator at least 2.2.032 (Patch Changer)

short_description: The beautiful town „Zille“ is a tourist place in Sauerland. Especially many tourists from Lower Saxony and Ruhr district go there. They have the opportunity to spend a nice day or even a vacation in „Zille“.
